title: BEST FLEX Expandable 200 Gravity Conveyor 2' x 36'
item_description:
BEST FLEX Expandable 200 Gravity Conveyor 2' x 36'

  • Overall width: 24"
  • Adjustable length: 9' to 36'
  • Adjustable height: 28 1/2 - 41 1/2"
  • Leg set per unit: 11
  • WT. (LBS.): 719
  • Condition: Used
  • Cost-effective conveyors for moving product out the door.
  • Recommended for light-duty manufacturers and assembly lines.
  • Collapsible for quick and easy storage.
  • Durable plastic skate wheels provide exceptional spin.
  • Load capacity - 200 lbs. per linear foot.
  • 5" swivel casters. Lockable end casters.

Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
